snippet.title: Headliner NoviNews - Announcement Trailer - Nintendo Switch
snippet.description:
Award-winning adventure where you play as a news editor. Decide which articles to publish and watch as the city around you changes, shaping the lives of four main characters. Share your story, and see the previous player's ending before you start.

Learn more about Headliner NoviNews: https://bit.ly/2Z4QMsL

#HeadlinerNoviNews #NintendoSwitch

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun! https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Visit Nintendo.com for all the latest! http://www.nintendo.com/
